title: This actor must be runned only from other actors

searchtext.title: Address or administrative area
searchtext.description: Address or administrative area as free text
searchtext.sectionDescription: Provide address to find coordinates and get up to 100 places or ALL recursively

isRecursiveSearch.title: Recursive Search
isRecursiveSearch.description: Works only when max results set to 100, will split address area by half until all possible results available

category.title: Get places of specified type
category.sectionCaption: Scraping places without search terms or URLs
category.sectionDescription: This option will get you all places from a specific search area, no matter if they are bakeries or petrol stations. The scrape however will be significantly slower and more costly than using a regular search, so we don't recommend using this unless strictly necessary.

lat.title: Latitude
lat.description: Use instead of search by address
lat.sectionDescription: Instead address you can specify location directly

lng.title: Longitude
lng.description: Use instead of search by address

radiusMeters.title: Search radius
radiusMeters.description: Radius from geocoded or custom coordinates, if 0 search is limited by approx 300km distance

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: A proxy server is required to run this actor! Either use an Apify residential proxy, or provide your own proxy servers. Datacenter proxies will not work.
proxy.sectionDescription: RESIDENTIAL proxy is required to run this actor! Datacenter proxies will not work.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Select how many times the page will be retried if the scraper is blocked or encounters other errors.
